item.title: Writing a Ray Tracer in Go
item.description: I recently decided to take up learning about 3D graphics programming. I knew absolutely nothing about graphics programming before starting the journey. I decided to learn about a particular graphics rendering technique called ray tracing. Ray tracing can be used to render photorealistic scenes. I found a highly recommended book titled The Ray Tracer Challenge. I personally recommend this book after having worked through it myself. In it is a cohesive, hands-on introduction to graphics programming.

item.title: Using grpc-gateway for JSON to gRPC transcoding
About
item.description: About Me Hello ðŸ‘‹ I’m Austin Gebauer. I live in Seattle, WA. I’m a software engineer. I studied computer science at the University of Washington. I’m currently working on networking software for NGINX as a part of F5 Networks. This Blog This blog is an outlet for me to share things that I’ve learned with others. Most of my posts will answer questions similar to: How does X work?
